modName: Lanterns of Skyrim and Towns and Villages Enhanced patch
summary: This mod allows to use Lanterns of Skyrim - All in one with Towns and Villages Enhanced - Villages and Towns and Villages Enhanced - Riverwood, normally incompatibles / Permette di usare la Lanterns of Skyrim e la Towns and Villages assieme
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=HotPink][size=3]My other mods[/size][/color]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26742]RCRN 36 _Revamped exterior fog Compatibility Patch[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/36746//?]Apple Garden[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26286]SIS -Stealth and Immersion Set[/url] [i][color=OrangeRed]featured on GEMS[/color][/i]
[line]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Uhyoq5N.jpg?1[/IMG]
[i][color=DarkCyan][size=6]Lanterns of Skyrim and Towns and Villages Enhanced patch[/size][/color][/i]
[color=BurlyWood]This mod allows to use changes brings from
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18916]Lanterns of Skyrim - All in one[/url] 
with 
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17406]Towns and Villages Enhanced - Villages[/url]
and
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18952]Towns and Villages Enhanced - Riverwood[/url]
normally incompatibles[/color]

[color=orange]It must be used instead of \"Towns and Villages Enhanced - Riverwood and Towns and Villages Enhanced - Villages\" mods no longer necessary.
For details see original mods
For all languages no needs translations[/color]
[size=3][color=red]Requires Skyrim version 1.8.151.0.7 or higher[/color][/size]
[size=3][color=yellow]Now cleaned with TES5edit 3.0.29[/color][/size]


[color=green]INSTALLATION:[/color]
Copy the \"Lanterns of Skyrim and Towns and Villages Enhanced patch\" in your Data folder and then put him, in the load order, AFTER \"Lanterns of Skyrim - All in one.esm\" and your Lanterns of Skyrim\'s favourite preset

[color=green]DISINSTALLATION:[/color]
Remove \"Lanterns of Skyrim and Towns and Villages Enhanced patch\" from your Data folder

[color=green]LOAD ORDER:[/color]
Skyrim.esm
Update.esm
....
Lanterns of Skyrim - All in One.esm (and a preset file ESP)
LoS and TaVE patch.esp
LoS and RE patch.esp

[color=green]OPTIONAL FILES:[/color]
An optional mod compatible also with Towns and Villages Enhanced: Villages Redux (available on [url= http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=123657651]Steam Workshop [/url]).
Only to use [b]with[/b]: Lanterns of Skyrim and Towns  and Villages Enhanced: Villages Redux.
....
[line]
[size=5][color=orange]ITALIANO[/color][/size]
[color=BurlyWood]Con questa mod, creata grazie agli spunti dell\'ottima guida
[url=http://viterbo-mensetmanus.forumfree.it/?t=60588971]Viterbo mens et manus[/url]
potrete sommare i miglioramenti apportati da
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18916]Lanterns of Skyrim - All in one[/url]
con
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17406]Towns and Villages Enhanced - Villages[/url]
e
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18952]Towns and Villages Enhanced - Riverwood[/url]

Resteranno tutte le migliorie apportate dai mod di [/color][color=yellow]Aplestormy[/color] [color=BurlyWood]tranne i lampioni e le lanterne che saranno quelli inseriti da[/color] [color=yellow]MannyGT[/color]
[color=BurlyWood]Un grazie a tutti e due gli autori delle mod originali[/color]

[color=red][size=3]Richiede Skyrim  1.8.151.0.7 o superiore[/size][/color]
[size=3][color=yellow]Ora pulito con  TES5edit 3.0.29[/color][/size]


[color=green]Installazione:[/color]
Copiate i file esp nella vostra cartella DATA (uno o tutti e due a seconda delle vostre preferenze) dopo il file \"Lanterns of Skyrim - All in one.esm\" e dopo il vostro settaggio preferito (opzioni della \"Lanterns of Skyrim - All in one\" altrimenti le luci rimangono rosse come in Oblivion)
Ricordatevi di spuntare le mod nel launcher di Skyrim

[color=green]Disinstallazione:[/color]
Cancellate il file esp

[color=green]Load order:[/color]
Skyrim.esm
Update.esm
...
Lanterns of Skyrim - All in One (più il vostro preset preferito)
LoS and TaVE patch
LoS and RE patch
...

[color=orange]N.B.:i files originali Towns and Villages Enhanced - Villages e Towns and Villages Enhanced - Riverwood non sono più necessari
Per i dettagli leggete le descrizioni delle mods originali[/color]

[color=green]FILE OPZIONALE[/color]
Una scelta alternativa per chi vuole usare Towns  and Villages Enhanced: Villages Redux (disponibile su [url= http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=123657651]Steam Workshop [/url]). 
Solo da usare [b]assieme[/b] a Lanterns of Skyrim e Towns  and Villages Enhanced: Villages Redux[/center]
author: improbabile

files.name: Optional patch for Towns and Villages Enhanced Villages Redux
files.changelogHtml: Cleaned with Tes5Edit / Pulito con Tes5Edit

files.changelogHtml: Removed a "dirty" rock in Rorikstead / Cancellata una roccia fastidiosa in Rorikstead
